summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6038 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, Garland's First Addition, being the alley between North 74th Street and North 75th Street from Fremont Avenue to Dayton Avenue; and certain other streets and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81992, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
